response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This product holds immense worth to me, reflecting years of dedication and hard work. I am confident it can bring unparalleled benefits to you as well.

I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $850,000. This represents a significant discount compared to its true value, which I estimate to be over $1,000,000. My intention is to ensure that such an exceptional opportunity does not pass you by without consideration.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide additional details or answer any queries you might have.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 850000}
